channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s First Halloween
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi John - So far, all of Kuri's wardrobe has been custom-made! Pretty cool, right? Although, we're pretty sure his favorite clothing stores would be JCRobots and Robots-R-Us. ;)
item.content:encoded: Hi John – So far, all of Kuri’s wardrobe has been custom-made! Pretty cool, right? Although, we’re pretty sure his favorite clothing stores would be JCRobots and Robots-R-Us. 😉

item.title: By: John Ashman-Wilkinson
item.dc:creator: John Ashman-Wilkinson
item.description: I look forward to seeing Kuri’s wardrobe and we does she buy it from
item.content:encoded: I look forward to seeing Kuri’s wardrobe and we does she buy it from

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Robert - Hahaha we love it! Please share with us pictures of your Cowboy Kuri (preferably taken at high noon ;).
item.content:encoded: Hi Robert – Hahaha we love it! Please share with us pictures of your Cowboy Kuri (preferably taken at high noon ;).

item.title: By: Robert Raymond Britz
item.dc:creator: Robert Raymond Britz
item.description: I really think my Kuri will look great with a cowboy hat next Halloween and maybe a vest! Cowboy Kuri..The fastest drawing robot in the West!;) yee-haw!
item.content:encoded: I really think my Kuri will look great with a cowboy hat next Halloween and maybe a vest! Cowboy Kuri..The fastest drawing robot in the West!;) yee-haw!
